com.stripe.stripeterminal

Interface TerminalListener

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    PaymentFragment, TerminalEventListener

    public interface TerminalListener
    The TerminalListener interface should be implemented in order to receive updates from a Terminal instance.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Default Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      default void onConnectionStatusChange(ConnectionStatus status)
      The Terminal's connection status changed.
      default void onPaymentStatusChange(PaymentStatus status)
      The Terminal's payment status changed.
      default void onReportLowBatteryWarning()
      The Terminal reported that the reader's battery level is low
      default void onReportReaderEvent(ReaderEvent event)
      The Terminal reported an event from the reader (e.g.
      default void onUnexpectedReaderDisconnect(Reader reader)
      The Terminal disconnected unexpectedly from the reader.

    • Method Detail

      • onReportReaderEvent

        default void onReportReaderEvent(ReaderEvent event)
        The Terminal reported an event from the reader (e.g. a card was inserted).
        Parameters:
        event - The event reported by the reader

      • onReportLowBatteryWarning

        default void onReportLowBatteryWarning()
        The Terminal reported that the reader's battery level is low

      • onUnexpectedReaderDisconnect

        default void onUnexpectedReaderDisconnect(Reader reader)
        The Terminal disconnected unexpectedly from the reader. In your implementation of this method, you may want to notify your user that the reader disconnected. You may also call Terminal.discoverReaders(com.stripe.stripeterminal.DiscoveryConfiguration, com.stripe.stripeterminal.DiscoveryListener, com.stripe.stripeterminal.Callback) to begin scanning for readers, and attempt to automatically reconnect to the disconnected reader. Be sure to either set a timeout or make it possible to cancel calls to Terminal.discoverReaders(com.stripe.stripeterminal.DiscoveryConfiguration, com.stripe.stripeterminal.DiscoveryListener, com.stripe.stripeterminal.Callback)
        Parameters:
        reader - The previously connected reader.

      • onConnectionStatusChange

        default void onConnectionStatusChange(ConnectionStatus status)
        The Terminal's connection status changed. Note: You should *not* use this method to detect when a reader unexpectedly disconnects from your app, as it cannot be used to accurately distinguish between expected and unexpected disconnect events. To detect unexpect disconnects (e.g. to automatically notify your user), you should instead use the onUnexpectedReaderDisconnect(com.stripe.stripeterminal.Reader) method.
        Parameters:
        status - The terminal's new connection status.

      • onPaymentStatusChange

        default void onPaymentStatusChange(PaymentStatus status)
        The Terminal's payment status changed.
        Parameters:
        status - The new payment status
